term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - coagulation (flocculation) in colloid chemistry
term.title: coagulation

item.text: When a sol is colloidally unstable (i.e. the rate of aggregation is not negligible) the formation of aggregates is called coagulation or flocculation.
